name: magicdventure
description:
Magicdventure is a platformer controllable by voice or keyboard. Solve the different and kill the final boss .

the voice controller have  some delay .(The game as been made with this constraint in mind). If the voice control doesn't work or if you don't like it, don't hesitate to switch the voice control to off in the control menu !

I hope you will enjoy the game , prepare your voice!

Make by : Sonzogni Benoît,Hervé Thomas.
